publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1896.3 Mary Scanlon: Action on Child Healthâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1896) in the name of Susan Deacon, leave out from "supports" to end and insert "calls upon the Scottish Executive to set out clear targets and timetabled objectives to ensure that child health is given primary status across its departments." Supported by: Ben Wallace*
